short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for a variety of symbols and letters to be inserted into writing, simply by copying them to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easier to use scientific symbols, and other letters in your writing. All you need to do is press a button, or type a sentence and the character(s) you are trying to get will be copied to your clipboard.
